metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5704 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the table-structure page inphpMyAdmin 4.6.x before 4.6.3 allows remote attackers to inject arbitraryweb script or HTML via vectors involving a comment.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
